citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on April 24,
2023. The inspector arrived at the premises, called and left a voicemail notifying the licensee of their arrival to the
property. No response was received and the inspector left the property at 2:36 PM.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on April 24, 
2023. The inspector arrived at the premises, called and left a voicemail notifying the licensee of their arrival to the 
property. No response was received and the inspector left the property at 2:36 PM. 
 
 
 
End Section
